Articles.Content:
Hi all, I\'m -1 Up, and I\'ve been playing KSP on and off for about 2-3 weeks. I\'ve been lurking on this forums as well.

I\'ve also been looking at the plugins section, and I have one question:

Where would I start if I wanted to make a plugin?

Anyways, hello, and I\'m happy to be here!

Where would I start if I wanted to make a plugin?

How much programming experience do you have, and in what languages?

How much programming experience do you have, and in what languages?

I have some experience, mostly in C++.

Okay, well you might do okay then. Unity is written in C#, so you shouldn\'t have too hard a time transitioning. My advice would be to look through the source code from other plugins to get a sense of what methods the Part class has. There are also some threads in the plugin forum that have some useful information (lists of methods and classes, some description of when some of the methods get run, etc)

Good luck

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
